org.hps.conditions.api

Class TableMetaData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.conditions.api.TableMetaData

  • public final class TableMetaData
extends Object
    This class provides meta data about a conditions table, including a list of fields. A row ID field called id is assumed to exist and be a primary key for the table. (Problems will occur if this is not the case!)

    The class also has references to the implementation classes which are used for mapping database operations to the ConditionsObject and ConditionsObjectCollection API.

    See Also:
    ConditionsObject, BaseConditionsObjectCollection
